segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s review your current mortgage details. Can you confirm who the owner of the loan is and the type of mortgage you have?
segments.client_message: Um, I thought it was my husband who, like, co-signed but now I'm kinda thinking it might just be me. I think I got a fixed-rate mortgage, but I'll double-check that.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. And do you remember the provider of your mortgage and any special rates associated with it?
segments.client_message: Oh, right... I think it’s with Bank of America. About the special rate, I was, like, sure it was 2.5% fixed until 2030, but yeah, maybe I should look at my paperwork again just to be safe.
